code: import React from"react";import{useEffect}from"react";import{useSetLang}from"../../../App";import{IconButton}from"@mui/material";import{QuantityContainer,ServeAmount,StyledAddIcon,StyledMinusIcon,SubTitle,ServeContainer}from"./servingsStyles";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Servings(_ref){let{servings,setServings}=_ref;const{lang}=useSetLang();useEffect(()=>{if((servings===null||servings===void 0?void 0:servings.length)>0&&!parseInt(servings)){setServings(1);}if((servings===null||servings===void 0?void 0:servings.length)>0&&servings<0){setServings(1);}},[servings]);function reduceServings(){let inputValue=servings;if(inputValue>1){inputValue=inputValue-1;setServings(inputValue);}}function increaseServings(e){let inputValue=servings;inputValue=inputValue+1;setServings(inputValue);}function getServings(e){let inputValue=e.target.value;setServings(inputValue);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(QuantityContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SubTitle,{children:lang==='ru'?'Порции':lang==='tj'?'Портсия':'Servings'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ServeContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:reduceServings,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledMinusIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ServeAmount,{value:servings,onChange:e=>getServings(e)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:increaseServings,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledAddIcon,{})})]})]});}
